channel.title: Change your Start Menu Button Name! With Pictures!
channel.description:
My 2nd very own tutorial, hope you guys like it =)
This is how your Lame Start Menu Button Name Looks like right now: [IMG]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/1329/startbuttonyi8.png[/img]
If you want to make it look cool like this, move on: [IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/5015/irfanvs4.png[/img]
1. First you must download this file (Size-161kb): http://www.driger1592.com/Downloads/ChangeStartButton1.rar
2. Now unzip it.
3. Open the unzipped folder up and double-click on the program "Change StarButton1" (only program there). This should come up: [IMG]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/8967/startbuttonyy1.png[/img]
4. Type in any L33t name you want for your start button and click "Change Startbutton name". [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/3586/l33tvy1.png[/img]
5. Enjoy your new L33t name for your Start Menu Button. [IMG]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/7923/l33t1og1.png[/img]
Note: To change back the Start button text the way it was, open the program and instead of typing another name, type in "start" and click "Change Startbutton name".
Enjoy :)
*Edit* Forgot to add [TUT] to the title, added now :)
[b]Ron: [/b] Editted out TUT in title. It's the tutorial section, it's implied.
